content: अंतरि {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> (अंतर् + इ) {@--1@} To go between, to stand in one's way, intervene to separate; रात्रेरेनं तदंतरियात् Ait. Br. {@--2@} To exclude from, to pass over, omit. {@--3@} To disappear, see अंतरित below. (--अयति) To come or step between, interpose; दर्दुरक उपसृत्य अंतरयति <ls>Mk. 2</ls> (it may also mean, ‘separates the two’).
